antifungal therapy
• diffuse leptomeningeal enhancement.
• multiple foci of brain enhancement
cryptococcal meningoencephalitis
• metastatic disease
• lymphoma
• hiv encephalitis
• meningitis
• encephalitis
48 year old man presents with a 3 week history of headache and worsening mental status.  known hiv+.
csf was positive for cryptococcal antigen
